greeting.text: Welcome to Grid-Town! I'm Sam, your friendly greeter. What would you like to know?

about-town.text: Grid-Town is a vibrant community hub! We have offices to the north, a cozy cafe to the west, meeting rooms to the east, an arcade to the south, and a beautiful lake in the corner!

directions.text: North has the office block with workstations. West has the cafe - Jamie makes great coffee! East has meeting rooms. South has the arcade for fun. And the lake is perfect for a peaceful walk!
